gboolean gtv_cell_has_parent_volume ( GtvCell *  c,
GtvVolume *  v 
)

Check if a GtvCell belongs to a given GtvVolume.

Parameters:
c a GtvCell;
v a GtvVolume.
Returns:
TRUE if c belongs to v, FALSE otherwise.
